title: Contraband (2012) 720p iTunes
description:
Contraband (2012) 109 min

DESCRIPTION:
Legendary smuggler Chris Farraday left his criminal past behind to be with his wife and sons, but when a ruthless drug kingpin threatens his family, he must summon his old skills and contacts for one last run.

SPECS IN BRIEF:
M4V file for iTunes/iDevices
V: 1280x544 23.98 fps h.264 @ 2050 Kbps
A: 160 Kbps 2.0 AAC & 384 Kbps 5.1 AC-3
S: English & English SDH / subs for Spanish dialogue burned-in from source

Contraband.2012.1080p.BluRay.X264-AMIABLE

PLAYBACK:
Encoded & tagged for iTunes and Apple devices (iPad, iPhone 4, etc) that can handle HD video, including *all* versions -- 2007, 2010, 2012 -- of the AppleTV set top box.
